Description: Parchment page of book; "Liber Institionis Michaelis Archangeli" in Old Nubian.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Qasr Ibrim (Nubia), 'Scattered in a few centimetres of dust overlying the pavement of the nave of the cathedral of St Mary the Virgin'.
Curator's comments: Published: Plumley and Browne, Old Nubian Texts from Qasr Ibrim I, 48-51, pl. 11
Bibliographic references: Bierbrier 1999 / Coptic antiquities in the Department of Egyptian Antiquities, British Museum (p.89)
Exhibition history: 2014-15 22 May to 19 April, London, British Museum, 'Ancient Lives, New Discoveries'
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Parchment Black ink Red ink Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: copydex self adhesive carpet tape Object Priority: A Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: A Curatorial condition comment: incomplete - page only
